column4: Guys, i unistalled my ATI drivers, and now my UI is again super fast, when i install the drivers, the UI is so slow i cant work on Ubuntu anymore ( Using Ubuntu 10.04 x64, and download the Linux x86_x64 ATi drivers ) any1 tell me how can i install the ati drivers without that my SO becomes slow??? thank you
random guess its because as soon as you install the newer drvers compiz gets turned on, so install the new driver and go to appearance and turn off compiz.
what is compiz ? i just want to know what it is b4 i remove i disable it
what is compiz ? i just want to know what it is b4 i disable it
